name: Cantor's Labyrinth
description:
A 'Serious Game' made as part of my Final Year project at University of Bath.

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement

E - Pick up an item / bag

1, 2, 3, 4 / Click on inventory slot - Drop an item

Space - Zoom out (only on some levels)

Q - Drop bag (only on some levels)

Hover mouse over Red Zones / Green Zones / Function Gates to see their details.

Credits

Development and Art by me.

Sounds are all CC0, from Freesound.org.

Music from Bensound.com.
